original: ENOCSON, Anders Simon, Grosshandlare, Gävle, f Sthlm 8/9 82 av lantbr A G E o h h, gm Frida Anderson. Handelsskola. Affärsbiträde i Tierp 98—03, praktik i Sthlm 03— 05, åter i Tierp ss affärsförest 05—07, chef f Tierps Hdls AB 07—19, start tills m kompanjon grhdlsfma Enocson & Co i Gävle 19, fortf inneh av denna. Under Tierps-tiden styr.led 1 Upl Ensk Bks avd.kont, i kommunala mell.-sk Ifr—19, led av hälsov.nmdn o tax.nmdn samt rev i municipalsamh :s kassor. Ordf i N :a Uppl Minuthandl.frn 10—20. Rev i Gävle städs pantlånekont, led av Gävle stadsrev o kass i missionsförs där. Ä^nat stort intresse åt missionsrör, spec söndagssk.-verksamh.
translated: ENOCSON, Anders Simon, Wholesale Merchant, Gävle, b. Stockholm 8/9 82, son of farmer A G E and h \ h, married to Frida Anderson. Business school. Clerk in Tierp 98-03, apprenticeship in Stockholm 03-05, back in Tierp as store manager 05-07, manager of Tierps Handels AB 07-19, started Enocson & Co trading company in Gävle in 19, still holds this position. During the time in Tierp, served as director and led the Upland Ensk Bank branch office, member of the municipal middle-school board from -19, member of the health board and tax board, and auditor of the municipal treasury. Chairman of the Northen Upland Minuthandlarna association 10-20. Auditor of the Gävle pawnshop office, member of the Gävle city auditor board, and treasurer in the mission congregation there. Devoted great interest to missionary work, especially Sunday school activities.
